img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character is engaged in combat with a large creature named "Black Luong." The setting appears to be a rocky, barren landscape. The character is performing an action, possibly an attack, as indicated by the dynamic pose and glowing effects surrounding them. Various icons and gauges are visible on the screen, suggesting elements of gameplay such as health, abilities, or items. The creature is partially obscured by visual effects, and the name "Black Luong" is displayed with a health bar, indicating it is an enemy or boss character.
